attributes.action: Hold a referendum before signing the EU treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU Treaty is in effect a constitution. Give the UK population the chance to decide whether we want to adopt it, as promised in your manifesto at the last election. If the treaty is as good as you claim then tell us about it so we can decide for ourselves. After all, you have been claiming to listen to us, haven't you Gordon?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
